name: Vegan Custard (Pastry Cream)
description: Silky smooth and rich vanilla vegan custard, made with only 6 ingredients! No eggs or milk needed. Perfect for eclairs, tarts, donuts and more!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup unsweetened plant milk (soy, almond, cashew, etc)
1 can full fat coconut milk (13.5 oz)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the plant milk and cornstarch in a measuring cup or bowl until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk the plant milk and cornstarch in a measuring cup or bowl until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: To a medium pot, add the coconut milk, sugar and milk/cornstarch mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: To a medium pot, add the coconut milk, sugar and milk/cornstarch mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the heat to medium-high, and whisk until smooth. Bring to a simmer and continue whisking for about 5 minutes, until thickened.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn the heat to medium-high, and whisk until smooth. Bring to a simmer and continue whisking for about 5 minutes, until thickened.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and vegan butter, until the butter is melted and the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and vegan butter, until the butter is melted and the mixture is smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in a bowl with a layer of plastic wrap touching the top of the custard, to avoid a film forming. Place it in the refrigerator for a few hours to cool (you can speed this up by sticking it in the freezer for 30 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Place in a bowl with a layer of plastic wrap touching the top of the custard, to avoid a film forming. Place it in the refrigerator for a few hours to cool (you can speed this up by sticking it in the freezer for 30 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Once cool, if it is clumpy at all, use an immersion blender to smooth it out. You could also use a high powered blender, stand mixer with a whisk attachment or a. hand mixer to smooth it out. Use immediately anywhere you'd like, or serve with a spoon and enjoy!
